name: Rapid Visual OAI Tool
short_description: Rapid Visual OAI Tool (RVOT) can be used to graphically construct a OAI-PMH repository from a collection of files.  The records in the original collection can be in any one of the acceptable format. The format currently supported are  RFC1807,Marc,COSATI
